translation.en: Fuck yes.
You need a towel, miss.

Glad to hear luck went your way in the Butler trial.

Shall I wait?

Have a glorious weekend.

Esteemed colleagues,
if I have learned anything in my 44 years on this Earth, it is this.
translation.fr: si j'ai appris quelque chose en 44 ans, c'est ceci.

translation.en: If it looks like a duck, walks like a duck, and quacks like a duck,
translation.fr: Si ça ressemble à un canard, marche et cancane comme un canard,

translation.en: vote aye for that duck.
And what about a duck caught having an affair
translation.fr: Et un canard en délit d'adultère avec un caneton

translation.en: with a duckling in his employ?
translation.fr: Et un canard en délit d'adultère avec un caneton à son service ?

translation.en: What does the honourable gentleman think such a duck should do?
translation.fr: Que devrait faire ce canard, honorable député ?

translation.en: Swim.
Order! Order!
So he acquitted himself well?
Oh, you mean other than having an affair with a subordinate half his age
translation.fr: À part s'envoyer en l'air avec une subalterne de 20 ans

translation.en: and fucking her in a Westminster lift before elevenses?
translation.fr: À part s'envoyer en l'air avec une subalterne de 20 ans à Westminster avant 11 h ?

translation.en: I mean today, in the House. And she's not half his age.
translation.fr: Aujourd'hui, à la Chambre. Et elle n'a pas 20 ans.

translation.en: - Looks it. - Plus, he's popular.
You're the one who told me he's number two on sexymp.co.uk, or whatever it is.
translation.fr: Tu m'as dit qu'il était numéro deux sur sexymp.co.uk.

translation.en: He's moved to number one.
Well, that's surely a first for a member of the Conservative Party.
translation.fr: Une première pour le Parti conservateur.

translation.en: Besides which, he's the most naturally gifted politician
translation.fr: Et puis, c'est le politicien le plus doué

translation.en: on our side of the Chamber.
Still, if he gets full on MeToo'd,
translation.fr: Si MeToo le prend pour cible,

translation.en: it could start to make your loyalty look ill- advised.
It would make the public wonder what it's based on, Prime Minister.
translation.fr: Le public s'interrogera sur la raison de cette loyauté.

translation.en: History. Nothing more complicated.
James Whitehouse's famous shepherd's pie.
translation.fr: Le célèbre plat de James Whitehouse, le hachis parmentier.

translation.en: - Isn't that Granny's recipe? - Only better.
translation.fr: - C'est la recette de mamie, non ? - En mieux.

translation.en: This is version 2.0.
We haven't had this in ages. I make it all the time.
translation.fr: - Le dernier, ça remonte. - J'en fais tout le temps.

translation.en: Really? Is that why you had Tuppence walk you through the recipe on three occasions?
translation.fr: Tu as demandé la recette à Tuppence à trois reprises, non ?

translation.en: I suppose it has been quite a while.
It's yummy, Daddy.
- Good. - Napkins.
Mmm. Yes, James. Really good.
So yummy.
- Would you like some wine? - Please.
translation.fr: - Tu veux du vin ? - Oui, merci.

translation.en: - Krystyna, would you some? - No. Thank you.
I'd like to propose a toast.
- To what? - To Mummy.
No. Why?
'Cause she's the most wonderful woman I know.
- To Mummy. - To Mummy.
- Sorry. - No.
- - So I read your draft proposal.
translation.fr: J'ai lu ton ébauche de proposition.

translation.en: And?
I think it's cracking.
Too bad. The hardliners are telling me it's too humane.
translation.fr: Les radicaux la trouvent trop humaine.

translation.en: What do you think? Can I have some more?
Oh God, sorry. I'm sorry.
- - Oh, now it's empty.
Well, that explains how you managed to take advantage of me.
translation.fr: Ceci explique comment tu as profité de moi.

translation.en: Oh yes. Sorry about that.
Where are you?
At the office.
At this hour on a Friday?
That's bonkers. Come round for a drink.
translation.fr: N'importe quoi. Viens boire un verre.

translation.en: I'd love to, but I got pulled into something.
Oh, it's the holiday season.
For fuck's sake, live a little, Woodcroft.
translation.fr: Bon sang, vis un peu, Woodcroft.

translation.en: I'm already sipping a Scotch, you'll be happy to hear.
Good.
Well, you can chase it with some fizz.
A kid in my class's parents knew just what I asked Father Christmas for.
translation.fr: Les parents d'un enfant de ma classe ont deviné ma liste au Père Noël.

translation.en: - Where are Ed and your kids? - He took them to a movie.
translation.fr: - Où sont Ed et tes enfants ? - Au cinéma.

translation.en: So I've, more or less, one more hour of peace, quiet, and laundry.
translation.fr: J'ai plus ou moins une heure de calme et de lessive.

translation.en: Come on. Please?
We can get pleasantly pissed while you watch me fold.
translation.fr: On picolera et tu me regarderas plier.

translation.en: Look, I'll just be distracted until I finish with these papers.
translation.fr: Mon attention serait accaparée par ce dossier.

translation.en: What is it?
The usual…  …but quite high- profile.
translation.fr: Une affaire classique. Mais à grand retentissement.

translation.en: I'm not sure I should take this one. Of course you should.
translation.fr: - Je ne devrais peut-être pas accepter. - Bien sûr que si.

translation.en: Look, I really shouldn't discuss it.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas en parler.

translation.en: Oh don't be ridiculous. You can certainly tell me.
translation.fr: Ne sois pas ridicule. À moi, tu peux.

translation.en: Love you.
Thanks, Kenneth. See you in a bit.
Yes.
Is that Mrs Whitehouse?
Isn't that James Whitehouse's wife?
- Sophie. - Mrs Whitehouse.
Can you give us a comment about your husband's affair?
Mrs Whitehouse.
- Hi, it's Whitehouse. - Hi.
- Can I take your coat? - Thanks.
- Really? - I know.
Hello.
- You remember Lawrence Hughes- Davies? - Of course.
translation.fr: - Tu te rappelles L. Hughes-Davies ? - Mais oui.

translation.en: - How are you? - Very good.
- Good. Yeah. - Listen, I was just saying to James.
translation.fr: Je disais à James à l'instant.

translation.en: I've witnessed every kind of weather
translation.fr: J'ai assisté à toutes sortes de tempêtes

translation.en: in the three and a half decades I've been here.
This doesn't qualify as a squall. Not even a disturbance.
translation.fr: Ceci n'est pas une bourrasque. Pas même une petite perturbation.

translation.en: Just a bit of rain, dear.
And look…  …it's passed.
Now, boys will be boys, but I'm sure this one has learned his lesson.
translation.fr: Les garçons sont ce qu'ils sont. Celui-ci a retenu la leçon.

translation.en: My wife always said, Once, okay. Twice, go away.
translation.fr: Ma femme disait : Une fois passe. Deux fois casse.

translation.en: I left it at once.
translation.fr: Je m'en suis tenu à une fois.

translation.en: Enjoy your tea. Hmm?
I'm sorry about that.
You know, I thought I was, um, fine coming here,
translation.fr: Je pensais avoir la force de venir ici,

translation.en: but it's bringing it all back.
The affair?
No.
No. My fear.
About what?
I thought we were clear all those years ago.
translation.fr: On avait mis ça au clair il y a longtemps.

translation.en: I am not my mother.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas ma mère.

translation.en: I will not live my mother's life.
translation.fr: Je ne vivrai pas la vie de ma mère.

translation.en: I will not be the long- suffering spouse.
Once, okay. Twice, go away. Fuck off.
translation.fr: Une fois passe, deux fois casse. Mon cul !

translation.en: I'm not interested.
And I can't do it, James.
Especially in the fishbowl of politics.
translation.fr: Surtout avec ce voyeurisme en politique.

translation.en: I always thought that our marriage was, um…
translation.fr: J'ai toujours pensé que notre mariage était…

translation.en: …superior.
Immune.
Was that the lift?
What do you mean?
The one that I just came up in.
translation.fr: Celui que je viens de prendre.

translation.en: Was that one of the sites of your affair?
translation.fr: C'était un des lieux de tes ébats ?

translation.en: The one that made the headlines?
translation.fr: Celui qui a fait les gros titres ?

translation.en: Jesus.
I'm so sorry.
I should have found another…
It was thoughtless.
Soph, as awful as this week has been, and everything I put you through,
translation.fr: Sophie, malgré cette semaine horrible et ce que je t'ai fait subir,

translation.en: I am grateful for one thing.
translation.fr: je te remercie pour une chose.

translation.en: The certainty that you are the person I want to die with.
translation.fr: La certitude que tu es la personne avec qui je veux mourir.

translation.en: Would die for.
Making this right with you is all I care about.
translation.fr: Réparer le tort que je t'ai causé, c'est tout ce qui m'importe.

translation.en: You and the kids.
If you tell me to…
I will give up all this.
I swear.
I will stand up right now and tell this room full of MPs that I resign.
translation.fr: Je me lève et dis à tous ces députés que je démissionne.

translation.en: Right now.
If that's what you want.
translation.fr: Si c'est ce que tu veux.

translation.en: If the future doesn't include you, Sophie Whitehouse,
translation.fr: Si l'avenir ne t'inclut pas, Sophie Whitehouse,

translation.en: the future is shite.
You sure you don't want Kenneth to take you back?
You'll get home earlier this way.
translation.fr: Non, tu seras plus vite rentré.

translation.en: Come on, James!
Come on, James!
Bloody hell, they're fast.
They're unstoppable.
If only he were a bit dim, it might seem fair.
translation.fr: Si seulement il était bête, ça serait juste.

translation.en: But no, your boyfriend got dealt all the best cards,
translation.fr: Mais non, ton petit ami coche toutes les cases.

translation.en: including a spot as an Oxford Blue.
What?
It comes from the Canaanite word for lord.
translation.fr: Ça vient du mot cananéen signifiant seigneur.

translation.en: He's the god of beauty and desire.
translation.fr: Le dieu de la beauté et du désir.

translation.en: Holly, James Whitehouse is taken.
I'm going to marry that boy one day.
You gonna tell him you're gonna marry him?
He knows.
He just doesn't know that he knows.
translation.fr: Il ne sait pas qu'il le sait.

translation.en: Oh, James.
Nice to see Sophie here.  Thank you.
translation.fr: - Ravi de voir Sophie ici. - Merci.

translation.en: - Mr Whitehouse. - Yes?
Detective Sergeant Willis.
This is my colleague, Detective Constable Rydon.
We've been trying to contact you.
translation.fr: On a essayé de vous joindre.

translation.en: But your office seemed to have lost track of you.
Well, I switched my mobile off while I had tea with my wife.
translation.fr: J'ai éteint mon portable, j'étais avec ma femme.

translation.en: Criminal behaviour, I know.
- May I ask what this is about? - Olivia Lytton.
What about her?
We'd like to ask you a few questions in connection with an allegation.
translation.fr: Nous avons des questions au sujet d'une accusation.

translation.en: An allegation of what? Rape, sir.
An allegation of rape.
♪ How the mighty fall ♪
